Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Croatian \Cro*a"tian\ (kr?-?"shan), a. Of or pertaining to Croatia. -- n. A Croat. [1913 Webster]
Croatian adj : of or relating to or characteristic of Croatia or its people or language; "Croatian villages" n : a member of the Slavic people living in Croatia [syn: {Croat}]
